cause.description:
Sick of seeing wrestlers like Tommy Dreamer and Balls Mahony lose to people like Umaga and whoever else the WWE decides to push? ECW Originals are legends in they're own right and deserve to be treated as such.
1. ECW wrestlers revolutionized the industry, and deserve respect.
cause.mission: Stop the WWE from jobbing the original ECW wrestlers
cause.name: Stop Jobbing ECW Originals
